Biography

2023 Honorable Mention All-CAA defensive line

2023 Phil Steele All-CAA Fifth Team defensive line

2023: Converted to defensive line, earning Honorable Mention All-CAA in his first year at the position... had Towson's team lead in sacks through 10 games, finishing third on the team with five sacks and second on Towson with 7.5 tackles for loss, having 37 tackles and two fumble recoveries... in first career start on defense, finished with seven tackles vs. Norfolk State (9/23)... tallied six tackles, 1.5 sacks and a fumble recovery vs. UAlbany (10/7)... earned two solo sacks and six total tackles at Villanova (11/11).

2022: One of Towson's primary fullbacks, playing all 11 games with three starts... also a member of the special teams unit... made three receptions for 23 yards, with a catch in three Towson victories: at Bucknell (9/3), at Monmouth (10/29) and vs. Hampton (11/19).

2021: Played in four games at fullback for Towson, starting the last game of the year at James Madison (11/20)... earned first collegiate touchdown on a 15-yard reception at Richmond (11/6).

HIGH SCHOOL: Three-sport athlete at Dunbar High in Baltimore... helped the Poets to a pair of Maryland 1A state title games, including a championship in 2017... primary running back as a senior, rushing for 934 yards and 13 rushing touchdowns, also adding 122 tackles and 14 sacks at linebacker... team captain as a senior... also competed in track & field and wrestling... competed in the shot put and discus throw for the track & field team... helped the wrestling team reach the 1A state final in 2020, earning a win in the 285-lb class.
